name: AI-Powered NFT & Digital Asset Management
description: Evaluation template for AI applications in NFT creation, curation, and digital asset management
author: Web3 BD Team

categories.name: AI Generation Capabilities
categories.description: Evaluation of AI's ability to generate and modify digital assets

metrics.name: Style Consistency
metrics.description: Consistency in style and quality across generations

metrics.name: Customization Options
metrics.description: Level of control and customization available

categories.name: Asset Management
categories.description: Evaluation of digital asset management capabilities

metrics.name: Metadata Handling
metrics.description: Quality of metadata management and organization

metrics.name: Version Control
metrics.description: Ability to track and manage asset versions

metrics.name: Storage Efficiency
metrics.description: Efficiency of storage and retrieval systems

categories.name: Marketplace Integration
categories.description: Evaluation of marketplace and trading capabilities

metrics.name: Marketplace Support
metrics.description: Number and quality of supported marketplaces

categories.name: Community Features
categories.description: Evaluation of community engagement and collaboration features

metrics.name: Governance Features
metrics.description: Quality of governance and decision-making tools
